name: Skullhead
description:
As a boneless slime finding utter disgust in all things bone, you must destroy the Bone Lord and rid the world of bones.

Controls:

A and D to move left and right respectively.

Space to jump.

Right arrow to shoot GOO.

Programming by: Sebastian Schindler

Design by: Demmy Mangusso and Cam Connor

Art by: Benjamin Aube

Made for Becker: IGDA's Halloween 2017 Game Jam in only a few hours. By scratch. With goo. No bones.
